sn54.6:1.4: Evaṃ vutte, āyasmā ariṭṭho bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn54.6:1.6: “Yathā kathaṃ pana tvaṃ, ariṭṭha, bhāvesi ānāpānassatin”ti?
sn54.6:1.7: “Atītesu me, bhante, kāmesu kāmacchando pahīno, anāgatesu me kāmesu kāmacchando vigato, ajjhattabahiddhā ca me dhammesu paṭighasaññā suppaṭivinītā.
sn54.6:2.2: Api ca, ariṭṭha, yathā ānāpānassati vitthārena paripuṇṇā hoti
sn54.6:2.3: taṃ suṇāhi, sādhukaṃ manasi karohi; bhāsissāmī”ti.
sn54.6:2.4: “Evaṃ, bhante”ti kho āyasmā ariṭṭho bhagavato paccassosi.
sn54.6:3.2: Idha, ariṭṭha, bhikkhu araññagato vā rukkhamūlagato vā suññāgāragato vā nisīdati pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā ujuṃ kāyaṃ paṇidhāya parimukhaṃ satiṃ upaṭṭhapetvā.
sn54.6:3.6: Evaṃ kho, ariṭṭha, ānāpānassati vitthārena paripuṇṇā hotī”ti.
